name: Livewire Technologies
description:
LiveWire Technologies, Inc., provides consulting services specific to individual management and technology needs of each of its law firm and corporate legal department clients. With our twenty years of law firm management, technical certifications with legal application providers and hands-on technical skills we continue to enjoy long term relationships with industry leaders. We have the expertise to provide:
Consulting and design services to eliminate the anxiety of planning, implementing and maintaining the technology required to do business.
Development and implementation of the most comprehensive technology solutions tailored to the unique needs of clients’ practices from single project applications to firm-wide infrastructure while leveraging our clients’ existing technology investment.
Consulting and design services to improve process efficiencies, enhance attorney productivity and increase service value to clients.
READ MORE...
